step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arm overhead. Try to keep your shoulder and elbow a little more stable.
Your arm is well-positioned overhead. Focus on keeping your elbow and wrist more stable during this step.
Excellent work opening your hand wide. Keep your shoulder and elbow steady.
Great job making a fist and tightening your muscles. Try to keep your shoulder and elbow a bit more still.

exercise_summary: You did a great job stretching your arm overhead and opening your hand wide. Remember to keep your arm and elbow steady during the fist-making and relaxing movements to maximize the pumping action.
